database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to push and fetch data from the database.
    Author:
    magnubau, saramoh, shahedsa, williad

      • registerUser

        public int registerUser(java.lang.String un)
        Register a new user in the DB, Takes username as parameter, an id for the user is generated automatically Rank, lobbyKey and host in the user-table sets as default
        Parameters:
        un - username for the user
        Returns:
        1 if the user is registered successfully

      • createPlayer

        public int createPlayer(boolean playable)
        Creates a player in the database with the users userId and lobbyKey.
        Parameters:
        playable - boolean that is true if the player will be controlled by a user, and false if it will be controlles by the computer.
        Returns:
        true if update is executed, false otherwise.
